title: What person currently rules over the United States? Is it King George Washington? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: George Washington likely could have made himself a King. He chose not to. So no King currently runs the United States. We are governed as a Democratic Republic.
No one “rules over the United States.” This is something the Leftists in Congress just can’t get through their heads. This is a Republic, not a Monarchy.
